name: Roseland
description:
Daniel Roberts is a 18 years old student who is about to go fulfill his dreams and becomes successful in his life.

He studies a High school named Roseland Academy where thousand of students bullies him everyday just for FUN. Oneday, he got transferred to another world along with his classmates but he got betrayed by his own partners.

Full of hatred, will he tries to get revenge or to make peace and save the world from the destruction.

It's just the first chapiter of the game, feel free to critize it and help me to make it even better If you are familiar with rpg maker mv, you can send me your character so that I can put it in the game!
